toggle_switch.title: Lite Mode
toggle_switch.second_title: Disabling Lite Mode relaunches etaHEN services and any auto load plugins

list.title: Automatically Open after etaHEN loads

toggle_switch.title: etaHEN Toolbox on Startup
toggle_switch.confirm: If disabled you will have to either re-add the toolbox or change the Startup setting via Itemzflow's settings menu manually, this will NOT disable any auto start plugins
